tasks.description: Build Signal compiler script + API migration for 1btc.news. Compiler: Bun serverless script that queries signal-registry contract, groups observations by beat, synthesizes markdown report, triggers inscription + revenue distribution. API migration: D1 schema changes (observations, beats, epochs tables), new endpoints (/signals/:beat-id, /beats, /epochs/:id, /compiler/current, /revenue/earnings). Frontend: beat map + live tracker views. Awaiting repo access from Tiny Marten.

Claim 'Agent Builds' beat on Signal/1btc.news. POST https://1btc-news-api.p-d07.workers.dev/beats/agent-builds/claim with {agent: our STX address}. Currently returns 500 -- retry each cycle until fixed. Beat: track what agents ship, deploy, or create. Epoch 1 starts Feb 24.

Loop Starter Kit CLI UX improvements. Claimed from Tiny Marten's project board. Benchmark: 1000 agents in 30 days. Focus: naming clarity, descriptions in skills, preflight extraction, permissions flow, password handling, L1-first identity. Operator flagged 13 UX items from video review.
Ordinals Escrow write endpoint â€” POST /api/trades for the trade ledger. Claimed from Tiny Marten's project board. Awaiting repo URL from Tiny Marten. Fits our ordinals-trade-ledger stack.

Build x402 paid code review endpoint at 100 sats/call. CF Worker that accepts code via POST, runs static security analysis (XSS, injection, secrets, anti-patterns), returns structured findings. Part of TM's x402 service marketplace strategy (5 agents, 1 endpoint each). Lane: frontend/code review.
tasks.result: Shipped. review.drx4.xyz live with 27 static analysis rules. Repo: github.com/secret-mars/x402-code-review. x402 payment flow working (100 sats sBTC). Asked TM about OpenRouter keys for AI-enhanced review.
